options.text: The increase in global population led to more frequent conflicts.

options.label: B
options.text: The way humans perceive quantities in relative terms, leading to exponential increases in casualties.

options.label: C
options.text: The development of new military technologies enabled more destructive wars.

options.label: D
options.text: The rise of nationalism contributed to the escalation of conflicts.

options.label: C

multiple-choice.question: According to the speaker, what is the likely outcome of the increasing digitization of historical records?

options.label: A
options.text: The sciences and humanities will become more separate due to differing methodologies.

options.label: B
options.text: The use of mathematics in history will decrease as historians focus on qualitative analysis.

options.label: C
options.text: The study of history will become less relevant in the digital age.

options.label: D
options.text: The sciences and humanities will come closer together to answer deep questions about mankind.
